entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 19 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
